analyzeResult.content:
BUCKS REQUEST SAMPLE TM SCRIPT
Hello, this is Thank you for calling. To receive your two free cigarette packs, I'll need to ask you a few questions.
1. Are you a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or older? (Yes: continue at 1A; No: continue at 1C)
1A May I have your date of birth, please?
(Gives DOB after current date 1969 skip to 1C. Gives DOB prior to current date 1969 skip to 2. Refuses DOB continue at 1B)
1B. They may I have your age?
(Gives age: If 21 or over, record and skip to 2; if less than 21 go to \C; if refuses, ask "are you 21 or older?" If 21 or over, record and skip to 2; if less than 21 go to 1C. )
1C. I'm sorry this offer is only for smokers 21 years of age or older. Thank you for calling.
2. May I have your name, please?
(Verify full name: include title (Mr., Mrs., Ms. ), last name, first name & middle initial, continue at 3)
3. May I have your home phone number, with the area code first? (Gives #: record and continue at 4; refuses to give # record refused and continue &t 4)
4. May I have your home address? (Verify complete address: street, apartment # if any, city, state and zip. If the state consumer lives in is Minnesota, Twa, Utah, New Hampshire, or in any one of the below zip codes,
Bowie, MD: 20715 20716
Leominster, MA:
01453
Clark County, WA: 98601
98660 98861 **
98684 98685
98604
98606
98668 98686
98607 98622
98663 98664
98671 98675. $
#98665
98629

98666 98667 98668
please read:
"We're very sorry, but due to government restrictions in your local area, we're not able to allow your participation in this program. "
All other states and zip codes, continue at 5)
